mapper.select: SELECT ps_num, si_image, st_name, pi_image, p_name, p_price, TO_CHAR(ps_expiration ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') AS ps_expiration, ps_count, ps_price, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM preview prv WHERE prv.p_num = ps.p_num) AS prv_count, NVL((SELECT trunc(AVG(prv_scope),1) FROM preview prv WHERE prv.p_num = ps.p_num),0) AS prv_scope FROM customer c INNER JOIN favstore fs ON c.c_num = fs.c_num INNER JOIN store st ON fs.st_num = st.st_num INNER JOIN productsell ps ON st.s_num = ps.s_num INNER JOIN product p ON ps.p_num = p.p_num INNER JOIN proimage pi ON p.pi_num = pi.pi_num INNER JOIN storeimage si ON st.si_division = si.si_division WHERE c_id = #{c_id} AND ps_state = 0 ORDER BY st_name

SELECT ps_num, si_image, st_name, pi_image, p_name, p_price, TO_CHAR(ps_expiration ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') AS ps_expiration, ps_count, ps_price, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM preview prv WHERE prv.p_num = ps.p_num) AS prv_count, NVL((SELECT trunc(AVG(prv_scope),1) FROM preview prv WHERE prv.p_num = ps.p_num),0) AS prv_scope FROM storeimage si, store st, productsell ps, product p, proimage pi WHERE ps_state = 0 AND st.si_division = si.si_division AND st.s_num = ps.s_num AND ps.p_num = p.p_num AND p.pi_num = pi.pi_num ORDER BY st_name

SELECT ps_num, si_image, st_name, pi_image, p_name, p_price, TO_CHAR(ps_expiration ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') AS ps_expiration, ps_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM preview prv WHERE prv.p_num = ps.p_num) AS prv_count, NVL((SELECT trunc(AVG(prv_scope),1) FROM preview prv WHERE prv.p_num = ps.p_num),0) AS prv_scope, ps_price, calc_distance(#{c_lat}, #{c_lon}, st_lat, st_lon) AS distance FROM storeimage si, store st, productsell ps, product p, proimage pi WHERE ps_state = 0 AND st.si_division = si.si_division AND st.s_num = ps.s_num AND ps.p_num = p.p_num AND p.pi_num = pi.pi_num ORDER BY distance
